pr_title: Tyrus server support for native-image in SE

timeline.bodyText: Need to add nativeDescription that declares that only server is supported (unless this is feature for server only). If for server only, make sure we have a client feature as well that declares it is not supported (if possible).
timeline.author: tomas-langer

timeline.message:
Tyrus support for native-image

Signed-off-by: Daniel Kec <daniel.kec@oracle.com>

Tyrus support for native-image
